ActorTalk: All those bustling places outside, and you bring me somewhere so quiet and secluded?
That depends on what exactly you had in mind.
Just ordering? How boring. Let's make a game of it.
They have a self-service station, right? How about we each make a drink for the other?
Look at you, raring to go. I'll start first.
To handle all kinds of missions, you need a few special skills. Like—being alone in a quiet corner with the Gray Raven Commandant.
So, Commandant, what kind of flavor are you in the mood for?
Oh, you do love a challenge. Alright, one "Gray Raven Commandant" coming right up.
Here you go, one "[PlayerName]" special. Enjoy!
(The moment it hits your throat, it's like a burst of fiery spice ignites your taste buds.)
Cough—cough—
Oh dear, that was our "Blazing Inferno." This next one is what you actually ordered.
So sorry for the inconvenience!
Hmm... What to do? I know, I'll taste it first for you.
Now there's no excuse. Your turn, Commandant.
Tsk. Open up—
So? How is it?
You've got taste. I'll remember this "[PlayerName]" recipe. When you're craving it again, come beg me for another.
Hmm... The noise was unbearable, the decor was painfully tacky, and the food? Bland. Out of 100, I'd give it a negative 10.
But [PlayerName] was reasonably well-behaved at my side. I suppose that's worth about 70 points.
All together... just enough to pass. You did okay in the "satisfy Vera" category.
As for your "reward," I've already decided.
Our little "date" can go on a little longer... through tonight, until morning comes.
What are you standing there for? You still owe me a drink.
I'm curious, [PlayerName]. What do you think a drink called "Vera" would taste like?
You'll have to wait and see.
Oh, and let's stop by that photo booth by the entrance later. The way you were eyeing it earlier—so obvious. It was hilarious.
We've got plenty of time left. And you're not going anywhere until I'm fully satisfied, Commandant.
Fiery and intense, always bringing me new surprises. That's the impression I have of you, [PlayerName].
No matter what happens, you stay calm, like some stone statue in a university courtyard. This flavor fits you, doesn't it?
Not to your liking?
Want something to drink?
Sure.
I'll let you decide.
Didn't know you could mix drinks.
Surprise me.
How about something that tastes like "Gray Raven Commandant"?
(Taste)
And if this is another prank?
I'm not drinking that.
I still don't want to—
It's got a kick.
It's pretty mild.
All in all, not bad. Thanks.
So, Vera, what do you think of today's celebration?
That bad, huh...
You've got high standards.
As long as you're satisfied.
You scared me for a second...
